title: Walter Oscar Frost cabinet. Possibly from 1907.
author: Brian Van Horn

posts.post_title: Walter Oscar Frost cabinet. Possibly from 1907.
posts.post_content:
A couple of depressions in the mid-left border which do not go through to the back. Also, a small depression mark to the left of the bottom left of the picture. $150.00 

"The engagement is announced of Walter O. Frost and Miss Linna Henderson." In a handwritten note next to the newspaper announcement on the back bottom right of the cabinet is the handwritten date of February 2, 1907.

S/h on this item is $6.00. If paying by PayPal, please pay by PayPal Gift/Friends and Family to [url]wizard15243@yahoo.com[/url].

Hi Brian,
     Walter O. Frost was a lefthanded pitcher for the University of Maine in 1905-06.
My New England League records do not show that he graduated to that level.

[quote name="spec" post=2196316]Hi Brian,
     Walter O. Frost was a lefthanded pitcher for the University of Maine in 1905-06.
My New England League records do not show that he graduated to that level.[/QUOTE]

Thank you!
